articles.description: Against the West Indies, Suryakumar Yadav had a relatively quiet series by his lofty standards with two half-centuries and a total of 166 runs in four innings.
articles.content: Star India batter Suryakumar Yadav retained his top spot in the ICC Men's T20I Player Rankings among batters while Shubman Gill rose to number 25 in the latest rankings issued on Wednesday. Suryakuma… [+1993 chars]
